text: This is a list of years in India. See also the timeline of Indian history. For only articles about years in India that have been written, see Category:Years in India. ==Republic of India== === Twenty-first century === === Twentieth century === ==British India== === Nineteenth century === === Eighteenth century === === Seventeenth century === ==Medieval India== === Sixteenth century === === Fifteenth century === == See also == * List of years by country * Timeline of Indian history Category:History of India Category:India history-related lists India
title: List of years in India
